translation:
Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir

For the purpose of the mission to the Court of Rio de Janeiro, of which I am in charge by the Legislative Assembly of this Province, I request Your Excellency José de Araújo Ribeiro addressed to Bento Manuel Ribeiro on the 27th of last month, intercepted by the Most Excellent Your Excellency Your Excellency.

May God guard Your Excellency  
Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir  
Doctor Américo Cabral de Melo  
Domingos José de Almeida  
Member of the Deputation to Rio de Janeiro.  
Porto Alegre, March 7, 1836.
